Add custom tags to your run for filtrati: Ajouter des tags personnalisés à votre exécution pour filtration
Add a tag to the current execution: Ajouter un tag à l'exécution en cours
\nThis action add a tag to the current e:
This action add a tag to the current execution, this tag can be used to filter the execution in the **API** only at this moment.

**Note:** If you are looking to use it in the user interface, please open a feature request.
